item.title: Azure Icons Reference - All 284 Icons Searchable
item.description: Complete searchable reference of all Azure service icons with descriptions. Stop hunting through Microsoft's icon sets - everything in one Excel file.

item.title: I Scraped the Azure Periodic Table to Build a Service Dictionary (And You Can Use It)
item.description: The Azure Periodic Table is beautiful but not programmatically useful. So I scraped 200+ services into a PowerShell dictionary. Now my inventory tool shows service descriptions, naming conventions, and cost tiers.

item.title: Azure Service Inventory Tool: Which of the 397 Services Do You Actually Use?
item.description: The Azure Periodic Table is beautiful but useless for operations. Here's a tool that tells you which services you're actually using, how many, and what they cost.

item.title: 4 Logic Apps Every Azure Admin Should Build
item.description: Stop clicking buttons. These 4 Logic Apps automate the boring operational tasks that break when ignored: unused resources, certificate expiration, tag compliance, and backup verification.

item.title: The AI Collaboration Gap: What Azure Admins Need to Know About Claude vs Copilot
item.description: Everyone writes about building AI solutions. Nobody writes about using AI as a daily tool. Here's the technical breakdown of two different approaches to AI-assisted Azure operations.

item.title: Stop Losing Your KQL Queries: The Git-Based Query Library Nobody Told You About
item.description: You've written the perfect KQL query. Three months later, you can't find it. Here's the simple Git workflow that saves me 10+ hours a month searching for queries I already wrote.

item.title: I Migrated My Own Azure Virtual Desktop to Windows 11 with 512GB Disk Space
item.description: How I migrated from a cramped 127GB Windows 10 AVD to a spacious 512GB Windows 11 environment - including the gotchas nobody tells you about disk partitions, authentication, and user assignments.

item.title: Commenting for Continuity: Why My Code Comments Don't Look Like Yours (On Purpose)
item.description: Most guides say 'comment the why, not the what.' Azure admins need more: comments that double as runbooks, audit trails, and change-board briefs.

item.title: The Missing SOC 2 Guide: Azure Activity Log Setup (Grill Assembly Manual Edition)
item.description: Every guide says 'configure diagnostic settings.' Nobody shows you which button to click. Here's the step-by-step tutorial that actually works, written for someone who's never done this before.

item.title: SOC 2 Audit Prep Part 2: Azure AD Audit Log Retention Setup (Step-by-Step)
item.description: The grill assembly manual for capturing Azure AD audit logs - app registrations, consent grants, sign-ins, and role assignments. Every click, every command, every verification. Part 2 of fixing the 90-day audit gap.
